overview: German lyric tenor Christoph Prégardien presents composer Franz Schubert's renowned song cycle, "Die schöne Müllerin" -- a collection of 20 songs inspired by Wilhelm Müller's poems -- in this critically acclaimed performance. The video also includes an engrossing documentary in which Prégardien discusses his approach to performing "Die schöne Müllerin" and the challenges of channeling Schubert's artistry.
title: Die Schöne Müllerin
